judul: Python Natural Language Processing: Text Classification with NLTK
konten: NLTK (Natural Language Toolkit) is a library for natural language processing in Python...

contoh.isi:
import nltk
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

# Example of text classification using NLTK
sentence = 'This is an example sentence.'
words = word_tokenize(sentence)
filtered_words = [word for word in words if word.lower() not in stopwords.words('english')]
print('Filtered Words:', filtered_words)
contoh.komentar: Performs text classification using NLTK by filtering out stopwords.

topik.topik: Klasifikasi Teks dengan NLTK dalam Natural Language Processing (NLP) Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan NLTK untuk melakukan pemrosesan bahasa alami dan klasifikasi teks dalam Python.

highlight: library for natural language processing in Python

error.deskripsi: LookupError occurred due to missing NLTK resources or corpora.
error.solusi: Ensure NLTK resources or corpora are downloaded and accessible.

judul: Python Web Scraping: Introduction to Beautiful Soup
konten: Beautiful Soup is a Python library for parsing HTML and XML documents, extracting data, and navigating...

contoh.isi:
# Example of using Beautiful Soup for web scraping
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

# URL to scrape
url = 'https://example.com'

# Fetch HTML content
response = requests.get(url)
html_content = response.content

# Parse HTML
soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')

# Extract specific data
title = soup.title.string
print('Title:', title)
contoh.komentar: Uses Beautiful Soup to scrape data from a web page.

topik.topik: Pengantar Beautiful Soup untuk Web Scraping dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan Beautiful Soup untuk memparsing dokumen HTML dan XML, mengekstrak data, dan melakukan navigasi.

highlight: Python library for parsing HTML and XML documents

error.deskripsi: ConnectionError occurred due to failure to establish connection to the URL.
error.solusi: Ensure correct URL is used and internet connection is available.
